reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's style, with one mentioning it gives an expensive country picnic vibe, and they appreciate its fit, with one noting it hits right at the ankle. The fabric receives positive feedback for being thick and linen-like, while customers find it comfortable and flattering, with one highlighting how it hugs in all the right places. They like its color, particularly as a perfect summer white dress, and find it true to size. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite summer dress!
items.body: Super cute and flattering dress! Wore to a wedding in the heat and humidity of Dallas in August and it was so comfortable yet elegant enough for the occasion. I am 5’3” and felt that it hit at an appropriate length, and the waist detail is so cute! Fabric wrinkles easily, but nothing some wrinkle release spray or iron/steamer can’t fix. Also love that it has pockets and was such a pretty color of purple! Tie for halter top felt secure, and I have washed and air dried this dress a couple of times without issue. Can’t wait to keep wearing this! Read more
items.author: Brittney Brito

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress!! Buy it!
items.body: Lovely dress. Very surprised at how nice the quality is. It is comfortable and fits well. Just the right size and good fabric Read more
items.author: Amanda Nolan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Affordable Option
items.body: Good quality for the price. The color is amazing and in general, the fabric is very nice. I wish it was a little bit more form-fitting to the waist to accentuate my figure. It was a lovely and affordable option for the event I attended. Read more
items.author: Larkin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not exact
items.body: I love this brand, it’s great quality. This one just doesn’t look like the dress advertised. Still cute. Read more
items.author: elizabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great! Looks Expensive
items.body: Looks like it was purchased from anthro Or Anne Taylor! This is the perfect dress! Dress it up or down for a fun summer vibe! I receive compliments every time I wear this! Fits true to size and is very flattering. The fabric is soft and linen like. Read more
items.author: Shay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this dress!!!
items.body: This dress is adorable!! It fits perfectly. It’s modest, flattering, and feminine. I absolutely love it, I want to buy it in more colors! It does need to be ironed though, it’s super wrinkly when you first receive it. Read more
items.author: Hannah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, stylish
items.body: This dress fit well, had a flattering neckline, and hit at midi-length for me at 5'8". Looked great dressed down with white sneakers or dressed up with slip on wedges. Color was perfect, exactly as pictured. Fabric does not stretch and will wrinkle after washing but unwrinkles quickly with a travel sized steamer. Read more
items.author: C.B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the dress
items.body: Love this dress. Good quality. Looks great on. I received many compliments. Great summer dress. Can be used for many different occasions. I’m very happy with the purchase. Read more
items.author: Evelyn Awad

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hotpink, Pink, Blue, Ivory, Apricot, Royal Blue, Black, Sage, Lightpurple, Green, Watermelonred. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
